CustomField.formula:
IF (StatusTrackingDurationRollup__c > 0,
TEXT( FLOOR( StatusTrackingDurationRollup__c / 3600000 )) & " hours, " &
TEXT( FLOOR( StatusTrackingDurationRollup__c / 60000) - (FLOOR( StatusTrackingDurationRollup__c / 3600000 ))*60) & " mins"
,
"New")
CustomField.label: Time to Resolve
